author: Rory Sullivan, Rory Sullivan
title: Coronavirus: Wuhan celebrates end of lockdown with dazzling light show
description: Thousands leave city after restrictions lifted on Wednesday
content:
China has lifted an 11-week lockdown in the city of Wuhan, celebrating the occasion with a light show over the Yangtze River. 
The closure of Wuhan, the in Hubei Province where coronavirus was first identified late last year, started on 23 January and lasted… [+1426 chars]
